text.div:
This value set contains 4 concepts

ContactPointSystem

Telecommunications form for contact point

This value set defines its own terms in the system http://hl7.org/fhir/contact-point-system

CodeDisplayDefinitionv2 Map (0202)
phone PhoneThe value is a telephone number used for voice calls. Use of full international numbers starting with + is recommended to enable automatic dialing support but not required.~PH
fax FaxThe value is a fax machine. Use of full international numbers starting with + is recommended to enable automatic dialing support but not required.~FX
email EmailThe value is an email address.<Internet(for email addresses)
url UrlThe value is a url. This is intended for various personal contacts including blogs, Twitter, Facebook, etc. Do not use for email addresses.<Internet(for non-email kinds of addresses)

concept.definition: The value is a telephone number used for voice calls. Use of full international numbers starting with + is recommended to enable automatic dialing support but not required.
The value is a fax machine. Use of full international numbers starting with + is recommended to enable automatic dialing support but not required.
The value is an email address.
The value is a url. This is intended for various personal contacts including blogs, Twitter, Facebook, etc. Do not use for email addresses.
